000: An old office building of the regional mines. It is a beatiful building.
010: In the rear of the building the showers and cabins can be found.
022: On a desk several books and magazines were left behind.
024: This part of the building has bathtubs installed.
025: While I was shooting this picture I heard a door slamming. At first I thought it was the wind...
026: ... it wasn't the wind. A guy entered and told us it was forbidden to enter these buildings and we had to leave. We already saw everything so decided to leave.
003: All the other buildings of the mine are demolished. Only the shaft remains. This is a high profile exploration, there are guys at work everywhere.
